name: Siteheart
tag_list: ecommerce, mobilepayment, mobile, money, siteheart, surfing, search, quote
overview:
Siteheart Inc. has developed a range of innovative solutions and web-services for e-commerce, online payments, and social web which could be used by any internet users to easily create and maintain online business, send and receive money, pay for goods and services, monetize blogs, web-sites and social network profiles, explore Web in a new and entertaining way, organize and share quotes, learn how to program online, conduct advertising campaigns, etc. Today Siteheart’s products include payment&communication system Siteheart.com, online payment system Liqpay.com, visual internet browsing engine Walk2Web.com, on-line programming education service CodeIDE.com, person-to-person social advertising system FolkAd.com, social quotation service Deepmemo.com, online-business nanoshops solution AgentNano.com.

SiteHeart.com - developed and implemented new concept of e-commerce called “Live Market” — an open environment for communication and making transactions. It is an innovative payment-communication system that provides Live communication through on-line dialogue between Seller and Customer, comfortable deal fixation, safe method of on-line and off-line credit card payments.

Liqpay.com online payment system created by Siteheart lets anyone safely send money using mobile phone and Internet all over the world. Liqpay is based on one-time password technology (OTP), which guarantees strong identification of sender, card fraud prevention and the highest level of security. Another cornerstone of Liqpay is person-to-person card-to-card money transfer technology (“P2P”), provided by international payment systems Visa and MasterCard worldwide for any Issuing Bank, which lets recipient withdraw money from Liqpay system directly to the payment card of any bank worldwide. Liqpay.com developed the engine which allows exchange money using only the mobile phone number linked to Liqpay virtual account. Mobile phone number=Liqpay’s user ID.

Deepmemo.com is a social quotation service, which makes it easy and quickly to save, manage and share information online (quotes, pieces of text and/or pictures). The idea of Deepmemo is that as long as people read the web, they have necessity to save interesting links, texts, pictures, quotes and then discuss it and share with friends. Deepmemo web-site has web 2.0 and social network functionality: user profiles, tags, blogs, communities, friends, RSS feeds etc. Deepmemo service is useful for active Internet surfers, who’d like to remember interesting quotes or create their own collection of quotes for later usage. It’s useful for journalists, bloggers, copywriters, and people, who work with texts, since Deepmemo can help find interesting quotes. Service can be of great help for students, scholars and scientists, who write a diploma or a thesis and often need a way to organize quotes. Deepmemo saves quotes with a link to original web-site and a screen shot, so it’s a comfortable way to create bibliography.

FolkAd.com person-to-person social advertising system lets people monetize their blogs and web-sites. One can register in system, get a code and to put it in a blog. Advertising banners will be displayed in this block. Blogger can himself set a price for advertising in his blog and receive money directly to his payment card. FolkAd.com easily links bloggers and advertisers and provides easy way of payments to each other. This is NOT banner exchange network, NOT context advertizing, but POINT, site-targeted, P2P — advertizing service.

AgentNano.com project developed by Siteheart allows people easily start online-business or monetize blog or social network profile. AgentNano provides a virtual storefront. It lets users create portable storefront and post it to a site, blog, MySpace profile or anywhere on web. Users can host item descriptions on AgentNano web-server, track items and sales, chat with customers, and accept person-to-person payments with taking money directly to payment card.

Walk2Web.com is a new way to explore web developed by Siteheart. Walk2web visualizes the connections between sites, allows viewing, reviewing, bookmarking and voting for favorite sites. One can find amazing connections and many interesting sites by taking a five minutes’ walk down the Internet’s lane.

CodeIDE.com is an on-line programming education service, which helps you to start programming in a various languages just entering the web-site online. It is simple and easy in use both for beginners and for professionals.CodeIDE.com is globally accessible (from any place in the world and from any browser with Internet connection), results of program running are displayed on-line. It provides wide opportunities of individual and team-work (multy-user project creating mode), WIKI-community, compilation of tasted programs to executable files to use in different operational system (Windows/DOS, Linux, etc.) and a lot more. CodeIDE.com has already launched tool for Schools and universities which allows providing education of programming languages in group with a teacher with tasks, ratings, evaluating, and teachers’ support functionality.
